oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Union widow pensioner Elizabeth Goins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Elizabeth Lawson Goins (nee Miner) was widow of Stokely Lawson who served in Co. E, 8th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA and was hung by Confederate guerillas led by a Capt. Surgeonor in January of 1865. Capt. Lewis Jarvis, who commanded this company, provided an affadavit testifying to Lawson's service and death (see hawk007).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Goins, Elizabeth
